verses.verse: Now <WG1161> I say, <WG3004> That the <WG3588> heir, <WG2818> as long as <WG3745> he <WG5550> is <WG2076> a child, <WG3516> differeth <WG1308> nothing <WG3762> from a servant, <WG1401> though he be <WG5607> lord <WG2962> of all; <WG3956>
But <WG235> is <WG2076> under <WG5259> tutors <WG2012> and <WG2532> governors <WG3623> until <WG891> the <WG3588> time appointed <WG4287> of the <WG3588> father. <WG3962>

Even <WG2532> so <WG3779> we, <WG2249> when <WG3753> we were <WG2258> children, <WG3516> were <WG2258> in bondage <WG1402> under <WG5259> the <WG3588> elements <WG4747> of the <WG3588> world: <WG2889>

But <WG1161> when <WG3753> the <WG3588> fullness <WG4138> of the <WG3588> time <WG5550> was come, <WG2064> God <WG2316> sent forth <WG1821> his <WG848> Son, <WG5207> made <WG1096> of <WG1537> a woman, <WG1135> made <WG1096> under <WG5259> the law, <WG3551>
To <WG2443> redeem <WG1805> them <WG3588> that were under <WG5259> the law, <WG3551> that <WG2443> we might receive <WG618> the <WG3588> adoption of sons. <WG5206>

And <WG1161> because <WG3754> ye are <WG2075> sons, <WG5207> God <WG2316> hath sent forth <WG1821> the <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> of his <WG848> Son <WG5207> into <WG1519> your <WG5216> hearts, <WG2588> crying, <WG2896> Abba, <WG5> Father. <WG3962>

Wherefore <WG5620> thou art <WG1488> no more <WG3765> a servant, <WG1401> but <WG235> a son; <WG5207> and <WG1161> if <WG1487> a son, <WG5207> then <WG2532> an heir <WG2818> of God <WG2316> through <WG1223> Christ. <WG5547>
Howbeit <WG235> then, <WG5119> when <WG3303> ye knew <WG1492> not <WG3756> God, <WG2316> ye did service <WG1398> unto them which by nature <WG5449> are <WG5607> no <WG3361> gods. <WG2316>

But <WG1161> now, <WG3568> after that ye have known <WG1097> God, <WG2316> or <WG1161> rather <WG3123> are known <WG1097> of <WG5259> God, <WG2316> how <WG4459> turn <WG1994> ye again <WG3825> to <WG1909> the <WG3588> weak <WG772> and <WG2532> beggarly <WG4434> elements, <WG4747> whereunto <WG3739> ye <WG3825> desire <WG2309> again <WG509> to be in bondage? <WG1398>
Ye observe <WG3906> days, <WG2250> and <WG2532> months, <WG3376> and <WG2532> times, <WG2540> and <WG2532> years. <WG1763>
I am afraid <WG5399> of you, <WG5209> lest <WG3381> I have bestowed upon you labor <WG2872> <WG1519> <WG5209> in vain. <WG1500>

Brethren, <WG80> I beseech <WG1189> you, <WG5216> be <WG1096> as <WG5613> I <WG1473> am; for <WG3754> I <WG2504> am as <WG5613> ye <WG5210> are: ye have not injured me at all. <WG3762> <WG91> <WG3165>
Ye <WG1161> know <WG1492> how <WG3754> through <WG1223> infirmity <WG769> of the <WG3588> flesh <WG4561> I preached the gospel <WG2097> unto you <WG5213> at the first. <WG4386>

And <WG2532> my <WG3450> temptation <WG3986> which <WG3588> was in <WG1722> my <WG3450> flesh <WG4561> ye despised <WG1848> not, <WG3756> nor <WG3761> rejected; <WG1609> but <WG235> received <WG1209> me <WG3165> as <WG5613> an angel <WG32> of God, <WG2316> even as <WG5613> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Where <WG5101> is <WG2258> then <WG3767> the <WG3588> blessedness <WG3108> ye <WG5216> spake of? for <WG1063> I bear you record, <WG3140> <WG5213> that, <WG3754> if <WG1487> it had been possible, <WG1415> ye would have plucked out <WG1846> <WG302> your own <WG5216> eyes, <WG3788> and have given <WG1325> them to me. <WG3427>
Am I therefore <WG5620> become <WG1096> your <WG5216> enemy, <WG2190> because I tell you the truth? <WG226> <WG5213>
They zealously affect <WG2206> you, <WG5209> but not <WG3756> well; <WG2573> yea, <WG235> they would <WG2309> exclude <WG1576> you, <WG5209> that <WG2443> ye might affect <WG2206> them. <WG846>

But <WG1161> it is good <WG2570> to be zealously affected <WG2206> always <WG3842> in <WG1722> a good <WG2570> thing, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> only <WG3440> when I <WG3165> am present <WG3918> with <WG4314> you. <WG5209>
My <WG3450> little children, <WG5040> of whom <WG3739> I travail in birth <WG5605> again <WG3825> until <WG891> <WG3757> Christ <WG5547> be formed <WG3445> in <WG1722> you, <WG5213>

I <WG1161> desire <WG2309> to be present <WG3918> with <WG4314> you <WG5209> now, <WG737> and <WG2532> to change <WG236> my <WG3450> voice; <WG5456> for <WG3754> I stand in doubt <WG639> of <WG1722> you. <WG5213>
Tell <WG3004> me, <WG3427> ye that desire <WG2309> to be <WG1511> under <WG5259> the law, <WG3551> do ye not <WG3756> hear <WG191> the <WG3588> law? <WG3551>

For <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> that <WG3754> Abraham <WG11> had <WG2192> two <WG1417> sons, <WG5207> the one <WG1520> by <WG1537> a bondmaid, <WG3814> the <WG2532> other <WG1520> by <WG1537> a freewoman. <WG1658>

But <WG235> he <WG3588> <WG3303> who was of <WG1537> the <WG3588> bondwoman <WG3814> was born <WG1080> after <WG2596> the flesh; <WG4561> but <WG1161> he <WG3588> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> freewoman <WG1658> was by <WG1223> promise. <WG1860>

Which things <WG3748> are <WG2076> an allegory: <WG238> for <WG1063> these <WG3778> are <WG1526> the <WG3588> two <WG1417> covenants; <WG1242> the one <WG3391> <WG3303> from <WG575> the mount <WG3735> Sinai, <WG4614> which engendereth <WG1080> to <WG1519> bondage, <WG1397> which <WG3748> is <WG2076> Hagar. <WG28>

For <WG1063> this Hagar <WG28> is <WG2076> mount <WG3735> Sinai <WG4614> in <WG1722> Arabia, <WG688> and <WG1161> answereth to <WG4960> Jerusalem <WG2419> which now <WG3568> is, and <WG1161> is in bondage <WG1398> with <WG3326> her <WG848> children. <WG5043>
But <WG1161> Jerusalem <WG2419> which is above <WG507> is <WG2076> free, <WG1658> which <WG3748> is <WG2076> the mother <WG3384> of us <WG2257> all. <WG3956>

For <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> Rejoice, <WG2165> thou barren <WG4723> that bearest <WG5088> not; <WG3756> break forth <WG4486> and <WG2532> cry, <WG994> thou that travailest <WG5605> not; <WG3756> for <WG3754> the <WG3588> desolate <WG2048> hath <WG2192> many <WG4183> more <WG3123> children <WG5043> than <WG2228> she which hath <WG2192> a husband. <WG435>
Now <WG1161> we, <WG2249> brethren, <WG80> as <WG2596> Isaac <WG2464> was, are <WG2070> the children <WG5043> of promise. <WG1860>

But <WG235> as <WG5618> then <WG5119> he that was born <WG1080> after <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561> persecuted <WG1377> him <WG3588> that was born after <WG2596> the Spirit, <WG4151> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> it is now. <WG3568>

Nevertheless <WG235> what <WG5101> saith <WG3004> the <WG3588> Scripture? <WG1124> Cast out <WG1544> the <WG3588> bondwoman <WG3814> and <WG2532> her <WG846> son: <WG5207> for <WG1063> the <WG3588> son <WG5207> of the <WG3588> bondwoman <WG3814> shall not <WG3364> be heir <WG2816> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> son <WG5207> of the <WG3588> freewoman. <WG1658>
So then, <WG686> brethren, <WG80> we are <WG2070> not <WG3756> children <WG5043> of the bondwoman, <WG3814> but <WG235> of the <WG3588> free. <WG1658>
